title: Implement Redundancy for SendGrid
description: Deploy backup systems for SendGrid to eliminate single point of failure. Implement automatic failover mechanisms.
technicalDetails: Configure secondary provider with real-time synchronization. Implement health monitoring and automatic failover with <30 second transition time.
businessJustification: Eliminates critical dependency on SendGrid, protecting downstream services from cascading failures.

title: Enhanced Security for Auth0
description: Implement additional security controls for Auth0 due to high network centrality.
technicalDetails: Deploy advanced monitoring, implement zero-trust access controls, and enhance incident response capabilities.
businessJustification: Auth0 is a critical network hub - securing it protects multiple downstream dependencies.

title: Enhanced Security for Ping Identity
description: Implement additional security controls for Ping Identity due to high network centrality.
technicalDetails: Deploy advanced monitoring, implement zero-trust access controls, and enhance incident response capabilities.
businessJustification: Ping Identity is a critical network hub - securing it protects multiple downstream dependencies.

title: Enhanced Security for GitHub API
description: Implement additional security controls for GitHub API due to high network centrality.
technicalDetails: Deploy advanced monitoring, implement zero-trust access controls, and enhance incident response capabilities.
businessJustification: GitHub API is a critical network hub - securing it protects multiple downstream dependencies.

title: Multi-Factor Authentication Redundancy
description: Deploy secondary authentication provider as failover system.
technicalDetails: Coordinate with 5 authentication providers to implement redundant systems.
businessJustification: Reduces risk across entire authentication category, protecting 5 critical vendors.

title: Payment Processing Diversification
description: Implement multiple payment processors to reduce single-provider risk.
technicalDetails: Coordinate with 4 payment providers to implement redundant systems.
businessJustification: Reduces risk across entire payment category, protecting 4 critical vendors.

title: Data Backup and Recovery Enhancement
description: Implement cross-provider data replication and enhanced backup systems.
technicalDetails: Coordinate with 7 data providers to implement redundant systems.
businessJustification: Reduces risk across entire data category, protecting 7 critical vendors.
